tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. This ensures better officer quality.
Design your first survey ship. Essential components: engines, sensors, bridge, crew quarters, fuel tanks.
Survey your home system for minerals. This reveals resource locations for mining.
